Class Parallelogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.math.geometry.Polytope

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parallelotope, Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Parallelogram
extends Polygon
implements Parallelotope
    A quadrilateral with opposite sides parallel .
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
